summary: All three requested card updates/addition appear implemented in SelectedSignalsSection.tsx: ROLLAPPS link updated to luma.com with showPreview enabled, COINTELEGRAPH link updated with showPreview enabled, and a new FANCY STUDIOS card added next to Cointelegraph (immediately following in the signals array) with the exact requested category/description/link and showPreview enabled. The Open action uses target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer" for all cards.

hallucinated_features.description: Enabled LinkPreview rendering (showPreview: true) for additional existing cards (e.g., AVAIL — The Nexus Effect, NEON EVM — Network Extensions, AVAIL × ARCANA), beyond the three specified items.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals state not to change any other cards beyond the three specified items; the diff shows LinkPreview logic and showPreview enabled for other cards as well.
evidence: frontend/src/components/sections/SelectedSignalsSection.tsx (signals array sets showPreview: true for AVAIL/NEON/AVAIL×ARCANA; map renders <LinkPreview url={signal.link} /> when showPreview is true)
